title: 'These kids are coming home': Ford says there are plans to bring back Ontario students stranded in Peru - CTV News
description: 'These kids are coming home': Ford says there are plans to bring back Ontario students stranded in Peru CTV News Doug Ford says the COVID-19 fight depends on good data. A Star analysis found problems with the government’s case count Toronto Star Private compa…
content: TORONTO Premier Doug Ford says arrangements have been made to bring home a group of King City high school students who are stuck in Peru after the South American country closed its borders last weekend Speaking at Queens Park on Thursday Ford said pla chars
